chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma

Premises:
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
signature = Map nat : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
state = Map prec_list : Set
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
predta_compatible_compat_0 = fun (d1 : preDTA) (_ : predta_compatible (M0 state) d1) (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (H0 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0) (_ : MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1) => let H2 : Some s0 = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => (fun H3 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet state (M0 state) a0) (fun e : option state => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some s0) H3 in False_ind (mpl_compat s0 s1) H4) H2 end in H2 eq_refl : predta_compatible...
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0 H3 in let H7 : d = d -> prec_empty = prec_empty -> tl = tl -> 0 = lst_length...
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
borne_1_1 : forall (a : ad) (s' s : state), state_in_dta (M1 state a s') s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M1 state a s')
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

``` 
intros d0 d1 sigma H.
split.
- unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign in *. intros a s H'. apply H. exact H'.
- unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign in *. intros a s H'. apply H. exact H'.
```
